name: re1axmp

body.origin:

|- w0
-| w1
-| wi(w1, w0)
-| wn(wo(wn(wo(wn(wi(w1, w0)), wo(wn(w1), w0))), wn(wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), w0)), wi(w1, w0)))))
